info.name: KairosPulse-Alert-API
info.description:
Complete API collection for KairosPulse Alert system with 3 endpoints:

1. GET /api/alerts - Get all alerts with pagination
2. POST /api/alerts - Create new alert nodes (always adds new, never replaces)
3. GET /api/alerts/latest - Get only the most recent alert

Saves to MongoDB collection 'KairosPulse-Tracking' in 'kairosdb' database.

Each POST creates a new document/node with unique nodeId and MongoDB ObjectId.
